In his remarks, Lomax touched on the critical role education plays in living out Martin Luther King 's dream.`` Among the rights Martin Luther King fought for was the right to an education,'' he said. But his life was tragically cut short before he could lead us in the fight to afford the college education we needed, and the right to attend public schools that would prepare us to gain admission to and graduate from the colleges we had the legal right to attend. That battle he left for us. The breakfast got its start when UNCF and the Colin Powell Mills Foundation joined together to host a community celebration to honor the legacy of Martin Luther King . Network systems and data analysts, and medical scientists are the fastest growing occupations, but, despite the focus on`` knowledge'' jobs, the great majority of job openings will be in the low tech, non-professional positions, in jobs such as personal and home care aides, retail salespersons, cashiers, waiters and waitresses, and food preparation workers, Michael Bernick concludes.`` It may be time that our California workforce system gives these jobs greater consideration.''( http://sfg.ly/eXj0J3). to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''
